about_the_game:
A legendary artifact from the Era of Chaos. Its creator Drein had a frail body and was the weakest of his kind. His deepest desire was to be accepted. So, Drein searched for ways to gain power which would make him equal with others. One of the results of that searches was a Soul Reaper. Scythe, which can absorb the might of fallen enemies.

Soul Reaper is a new item for No King No Kingdom. The artifact will be automatically added to your inventory.

Soul Reaper has several abilities:
  • The scythe deals melee damage and absorbs soul when killing the target. The amount of power absorbed depends on the target's power.
  • Damage increases depending on how many souls the scythe has collected.
  • The scythe Summons minions when used on resources. The more power Soul Reaper has absorbed, the more minions it summons.
  • When Scythe gathers enough strength and is used on a golden tree it may conjure an uncontrollable anomaly boss fight.
